column4: is it just me or does anyone else hate dialup.... *already knows the answer*

apache is avaliable for ubuntu
you need to install it.  It's not installed by default

uname -r
yep

mine is working
it will help with the opengl screensavers
and you can install nvidia-settings too, which will allow you to play with brightness and gamma settings
k...a few people forget the sudo nvidia-glx-config enable command in the guide, so just remember to do that part too
its in the guide..don't let me confuse you ;)
